info.title: Website screenshots in real time
info.description: Retrieve real-time screenshots with one request. Full API description at https://browshot.com/api/documentation

get.description: List of all predefined web browsers.
Get details of a specific instance
Get the list of instances available.
Screenshots requests to private and shared instances require a positive balance.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the page to get a screenshot for

get.description: Delete details of your screenshots to remove any confidential information.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: data to remove: image (default), url, metadata, all

get.description: Once a screenshot has been requested, its status must be checked until it is either "error" or "finished".

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: 0-3 (default: 2): level of details about the screenshot and the page.

get.description: Get information about the last 100 screenshots requested.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of screenshots' information to return (maximum: 100)

get.description: Make your screenshots public, add notes, and share it with your friends and colleagues.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: Mote to add on the sharing page

get.description: Sends back the thumbnail as a PNG file.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.description: right edge of the area to be cropped

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: (default: 0) left edge of the area to be cropped

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.description: <fit|fill> (default: fit). Use fit to keep the original page ration, and fill to get a thumbnail for the exact width and height specified.

parameters.name: right
parameters.description: (default: 0) right edge of the area to be cropped

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: (default: 0) top edge of the area to be cropped

get.description: Get a screenshot or thumbnail in one request. make sure to follow all 302 redirections.

parameters.name: cache
parameters.description: Use a previous screenshot (same URL, same instance) if it was done within <cache> seconds. The default value is 24hours. Specify cache=0 if you want a new screenshot.

parameters.name: cookie
parameters.description: Set a cookie for the URL requested

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: 0-10 (default: 5): number of seconds to wait after the page has loaded. This is used to let JavaScript run longer before taking the screenshot. Use delay=0 to take screenshots faster.

parameters.name: flash_delay
parameters.description: 0-10 (default: 10): number of seconds to wait after the page has loaded if Flash elements are present. Use flash_delay=0 to take screenshots faster.

parameters.name: post_data
parameters.description: Send a POST requests with post_data, useful for filling out forms

parameters.name: script
parameters.description: URL of javascript file to execute after the page load event.
